subject: Basketball
Sexual Harassment
lead_paragraph: Dolan, the Knicks’ owner, has decided to get into the business of raising reputations from the ashes. He has recalled Isiah Thomas from purgatory, to serve as president of the W.N.B.A.’s Liberty.
snippet: Dolan, the Knicks’ owner, has decided to get into the business of raising reputations from the ashes. He has recalled Isiah Thomas from purgatory, to serve as president of the W.N.B.A.’s Liberty.
